body.p: After the installation is complete, the Splunk UI can be reached at http://<fqdn>:8000, where <fqdn> is the FQDN of one of your Linux Docker nodes. Mesh routing does not currently work on Windows so you must use a Linux node to access the UI. For example:
The default username and password for Splunk is admin / changeme.
Use the Docker App to view the Docker overview as shown in and the Docker stats as shown in .
Use the k8s App to see the Kubernetes overview as shown in and then access the details for deployments, daemon sets, replica sets, services, etc.
